file_content.text: Who are you? Why are you doing this? We don't keep a lot of credits here!
I'm looking for a Bith security officer named Zee.
Do I look like a thief?
Just take a couple deep breaths and tell me where Zee is.
Relax.
You're dead meat if you waste my time. Now, give me the Bith.
Cooperate or die.
The HoloNet security guy? Is he in trouble?
That's not your business.
Answer the question.
I've got a gun at your face and you want details?
You care that much? Really?
Right! What am I saying?
Fine, I'll ask the next guy. Say goodbye, worm.
You die.
Wait! Wait! Don't kill me! I'm sorry!
Zee's at the Imperial spaceport! He's on his way to Mechis Three for a business meeting! He's probably already gone!
I gave you what you wanted! You're not gonna kill me, are you?
Disappear. Now.
Run.
Right! I'm outta here!
No, of course not. What do I look like, a maniac?
Why would I kill you?
Thank you! Thank you so much!
Which makes you a coward. I hate cowards.
Yes. [Kill security officer]
I didn't even like... working here....
